snippet: Fans and news media, still ever-hungry for new factoids on all things Jeremy Lin, got another morsel at Friday night’s 13th Annual Knick Bowl on Pier 60 of Chelsea Piers.
abstract: Fans and news media, still ever-hungry for new factoids on all things Jeremy Lin, got another morsel at Friday night’s 13th Annual Knick Bowl on Pier 60 of Chelsea Piers.
